issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.amazon.com/gp/video/detail/B08GBYWQ6W/ref=atv_dp_season_select_s5?jic=8%7CEgNhbGw%3D](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fgp%2Fvideo%2Fdetail%2FB08GBYWQ6W%2Fref%3Datv_dp_season_select_s5%3Fjic%3D8%257CEgNhbGw%253D) ### Comment > Even with AdGuard enabled, Amazon Prime plays ads of other offerings between episodes. comment.body: In the mean time, is there a user rule that can disable the AdGuard URL Tracking filter & Legitimate URL Shortener for Amazon only?

issue.title: www.ebay.com
issue.body:

Open any single torrent page there - the first two clicks ANYWHERE on the screen will create two pop-up browser tabs with ad redirects. Username: `@dnovitskyi` ### Screenshots

Bias Fact Check, RECAP, Return YouTube Dislike, Sky Follower Bridge, SponsorBlock for YouTube, Volume Booster, wiki.gg Redirect ### Issue configuration pull_request.title: Fix #198597 webmotors.com.br
pull_request.body:
Issue: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198597

Should I use scriptlet instead for the cookie?

```adb
webmotors.com.br#%#//scriptlet('trusted-set-local-storage-item', 'wmCookieNotice', '{"showCookieNotice":false,"cookies":{"proposals":false,"search":false,"marketing":false,"experience":false}}')
```

There's also `adobedtm.com` tracker in the site.
